cover.alt: System Collapse cover. The Murderbot character crouches in a field of crops, towered over by a gigantic many-limbed bot.

cover.alt: This Book Could Save Your Life book cover. The title is in white on a plain black background. The subtitle, 'Breaking the silence around the mental health emergency' is in black text on an orange strip at the top.

title: This Book Could Save Your Life

cover.alt: Among the Trolls book cover. A white woman with long brown hair sits nonchalantly among various exasperated, angry and yelling people.

author: Danny Caine

cover.alt: How to Resist Amazon and Why cover. A turquoise fist is raised in defiance clutching a scrap of paper against a bright yellow background. The word Amazon in the title has the iconic Amazon arrow downturned into a sort of sad face.

title: How to Resist Amazon and Why
